denied.title: Location Access Blocked
denied.description: Your browser has blocked location access. Follow these steps to enable it:

step1.title: Click the lock icon
step1.description: Click the lock or shield icon next to the website URL in your browser's address bar

step2.title: Allow location access
step2.description: Find 'Location' in the permissions list and change it to 'Allow'

step3.title: Refresh the page
step3.description: Reload this page to try again

site.title: NomadNow - Digital Nomad Life Guide | City Exploration, Tax Optimization, Community Connection
site.description: NomadNow is the ultimate life guide for digital nomads, providing global city information, tax optimization advice, community connections and practical tools. Discover the best cities for digital nomads, optimize tax strategies, and connect with the global nomad community.
site.ogDescription: Discover the best cities for digital nomads, optimize tax strategies, and connect with the global nomad community.
site.structuredDataDescription: The ultimate life guide for digital nomads, providing global city information, tax optimization advice, community connections and practical tools

requirements.4: Reside in Portugal for more than 183 days/year
requirements.5: Not a Portuguese tax resident in the past 5 years

steps.0: Confirm eligibility under new policy conditions
steps.1: Prepare detailed profession and income documentation

tips.2: Consult professional tax advisors to assess eligibility
tips.4: Keep foreign income in foreign accounts

requirements.1: Do not remit foreign income locally
requirements.2: Reside locally for more than required days
requirements.3: Comply with local tax filing requirements
